scripts.sa: node build --copy && node build --composer-install && php site/vendor/bin/phpstan
scripts.unit-tests: node build --copy && node build --composer-install && cd site && php vendor/bin/phpunit tests/unit/Espo/Modules/{ModuleName}
scripts.integration-tests: node build --copy && node build --composer-install && cd site && php vendor/bin/phpunit tests/integration/Espo/Modules/{ModuleName}
